name: PsiTransferBuildArtifact
description: Publishes an build artifact to an psiShare endpoint
helpMarkDown: Uploads/Publishes an build artifact to a [psiShare](https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer) host.
author: evy Solutions GmbH

inputs.name: pathToPublish
inputs.label: File Path to Publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: File or Directory Path to Publish

inputs.name: withPathPhrase
inputs.label: Enable Password Protection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Switch to control if the artifact should be protected by an automatically generated passphrase

inputs.name: exportsUploadUriTo
inputs.label: Name of the build variable provided psiTransfer URI should be stored in
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the build variable the generated upload uri should be exported to

inputs.name: exportsPassphraseTo
inputs.label: Name of the build variable provided passphrase should be stored in
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the secured build variable the generated passphrase should be exported to

inputs.name: exportsProtectedUploadUriTo
inputs.label: Name of the build variable provided protected psiTransfer URI should be stored in
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the build variable the generated password protected upload uri should be exported to

inputs.name: retention
inputs.label: Keep at least for
inputs.helpMarkDown: Duration which indicates who long the published artifact(s) should been kept on the endpoint/psiShare host. Uses [parse-duration](https://www.npmjs.com/package/parse-duration) to parse this input.

inputs.name: passphraseLength
inputs.label: Lenght of generated passphrase
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates the lenght of the generated passphrase. Please consider that size does matter in this case.

messages.PsiTransferArtifactFilePathRequired: %s is not a valid file path. Only full file path can be published.
